statements: DELETE FROM social_media_campaign WHERE campaign_id = 5 AND platform = 'Twitter';
DELETE FROM social_media_campaign WHERE shares_count > 100 AND platform = 'Facebook';
DELETE FROM campaign_metrics WHERE metric_id = 101 AND shares_count > 1000;
DELETE FROM social_media_platforms WHERE platform_name = 'Twitter' AND platform_type = 'Social Networking';
DELETE FROM social_media_posts WHERE platform_id = 2 AND post_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM facebook_shares WHERE campaign_id = 100 AND user_id = 25;
DELETE FROM campaign_shares WHERE user_id = 100 AND campaign_id = 50
